column6: Increases the healing potency of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Pray<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to 5,000.

Grants the effect of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Pent-up Rage<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, increasing the potency of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Deadly Blow<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> based on the amount of damage you have taken while the effect is active.
<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Duration: <UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>15s

Improves <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Phantom Aim<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>'s critical hit rate and direct hit rate increase to 30%, and guarantees all attacks land.

Improves <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Phantom Aim<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>'s critical hit rate and direct hit rate increase to 50%, and guarantees all attacks land.

Increases the potency of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Iainuki<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to 500, and increases chance to instantly kill target to 10%.
Increases the effectiveness of songs in accordance with your Phantom Bard level.
Allows you to open locked doors in dungeons.

Grants a 5% chance to instantly kill targets when executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Phantom Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, with some exceptions.

Increases the effectiveness of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Battle Bell<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to 5%, and increases the healing potency of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Ringing Respite<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to 3,000.
